org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.codesystems

Enum MedicationrequestStatusReason

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<MedicationrequestStatusReason>
      • org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.codesystems.MedicationrequestStatusReason
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<MedicationrequestStatusReason>

    public enum MedicationrequestStatusReason
extends Enum<MedicationrequestStatusReason>

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      ALTCHOICE
      This therapy has been ordered as a backup to a preferred therapy.
      CLARIF
      Clarification is required before the order can be acted upon.
      DRUGHIGH
      The current level of the medication in the patient's system is too high.
      HOSPADM
      The patient has been admitted to a care facility and their community medications are suspended until hospital discharge.
      LABINT
      The therapy would interfere with a planned lab test and the therapy is being withdrawn until the test is completed.
      NONAVAIL
      Patient not available for a period of time due to a scheduled therapy, leave of absence or other reason.
      NULL
      added to help the parsers
      PREG
      The patient is pregnant or breast feeding.
      SALG
      The patient is believed to be allergic to a substance that is part of the therapy and the therapy is being temporarily withdrawn to confirm.
      SDDI
      The drug interacts with a short-term treatment that is more urgently required.
      SDUPTHER
      The drug interacts with a short-term treatment that is more urgently required.
      SINTOL
      The drug interacts with a short-term treatment that is more urgently required.
      SURG
      The drug is contraindicated for patients receiving surgery and the patient is scheduled to be admitted for surgery in the near future.
      WASHOUT
      The patient was previously receiving a medication contraindicated with the current medication.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • ALTCHOICE

        public static final MedicationrequestStatusReason ALTCHOICE
        This therapy has been ordered as a backup to a preferred therapy. This order will be released when and if the preferred therapy is unsuccessful.

      • CLARIF

        public static final MedicationrequestStatusReason CLARIF
        Clarification is required before the order can be acted upon.

      • DRUGHIGH

        public static final MedicationrequestStatusReason DRUGHIGH
        The current level of the medication in the patient's system is too high. The medication is suspended to allow the level to subside to a safer level.

      • HOSPADM

        public static final MedicationrequestStatusReason HOSPADM
        The patient has been admitted to a care facility and their community medications are suspended until hospital discharge.

      • LABINT

        public static final MedicationrequestStatusReason LABINT
        The therapy would interfere with a planned lab test and the therapy is being withdrawn until the test is completed.

      • NONAVAIL

        public static final MedicationrequestStatusReason NONAVAIL
        Patient not available for a period of time due to a scheduled therapy, leave of absence or other reason.

      • PREG

        public static final MedicationrequestStatusReason PREG
        The patient is pregnant or breast feeding. The therapy will be resumed when the pregnancy is complete and the patient is no longer breastfeeding.

      • SALG

        public static final MedicationrequestStatusReason SALG
        The patient is believed to be allergic to a substance that is part of the therapy and the therapy is being temporarily withdrawn to confirm.

      • SDDI

        public static final MedicationrequestStatusReason SDDI
        The drug interacts with a short-term treatment that is more urgently required. This order will be resumed when the short-term treatment is complete.

      • SDUPTHER

        public static final MedicationrequestStatusReason SDUPTHER
        The drug interacts with a short-term treatment that is more urgently required. This order will be resumed when the short-term treatment is complete.

      • SINTOL

        public static final MedicationrequestStatusReason SINTOL
        The drug interacts with a short-term treatment that is more urgently required. This order will be resumed when the short-term treatment is complete.

      • SURG

        public static final MedicationrequestStatusReason SURG
        The drug is contraindicated for patients receiving surgery and the patient is scheduled to be admitted for surgery in the near future. The drug will be resumed when the patient has sufficiently recovered from the surgery.

      • WASHOUT

        public static final MedicationrequestStatusReason WASHOUT
        The patient was previously receiving a medication contraindicated with the current medication. The current medication will remain on hold until the prior medication has been cleansed from their system.

      • NULL

        public static final MedicationrequestStatusReason NULL
        added to help the parsers
